REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2079 reute d f BC-UNITED-ASSET-<UAM>-CO 06-01 0057

TEXT.TITLE: UNITED ASSET <UAM> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: United Asset Management corp said it has completed the acquisition of Rice, Hall, James and Associates of San Diego for undisclosed terms. It said Rice Hall manages investments for institutions and individuals and has about 690 mln dlrs in assets under management currently. Reuter
